title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=4195dbb767ebd70a3209ea46a4497062e788c176
comments: Can anyone recommend good indian indie songs and artist that are soulful and not bollywood.

Artists:

When Chai Amet Toast, The Local Train, Prateek Kuhad, Raghu Dixit, Indian Ocean, Divine Raaga, Lagori, Anuv Jain.

Some which would be opposite of â€˜soulfulâ€™, but still awesome:

Coshish, Avial, Agam, The Down Troddence.


And Spotify is a good place to discover music. Hereâ€™s a playlist thatâ€™ll keep you busy for a while - [Radar India](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/37i9dQZF1DWTAtTdFMiJYK?si=vXhfMgGZSTW3zXrDdYwwBA  )

Anybody else from here discovered  Andre Antunes Metal remixes   of the Nooran Sisters  ? If not here you go :

1. [Tung Tung Metal remix](https://youtu.be/lO49ZY4tS2Y)

2. [If Red Hot Chili Peppers were from india](https://youtu.be/F3VYORQhhWY)

3. [If System of a down were from India](https://youtu.be/mi106DZJhuQ)

4. [Live Performance](https://youtu.be/nNYKP7YitxY)


We need this in india. Folk metal is fire ðŸ”¥

Hey guys!
So i listened to the Taylor Hawkins tribute concert on YouTube and it has got me hooked on the Foo fighters catalogue currently!!!

Also, this is the first time I'm seeing this thread! Looking forward to interacting more!!!

Any recommendations on headphones for listening music? Specifically looking for a balanced headphone that I can use for listening to music, donâ€™t want extra bass ones.
If youâ€™ve these, how are they: Bose nc700 or Sony xm5 or AirPods Pro.

I (my band) released something recently. Check it out here:

https://youtu.be/9LTDIHvtyLE

https://open.spotify.com/artist/5YbMXYyv5FvvJpqf7z44Pn?si=s215YCqzQeyjyAwanMyCvg

Hereâ€™s what my band has been up to ðŸŽ¸

https://open.spotify.com/artist/5YbMXYyv5FvvJpqf7z44Pn?si=s215YCqzQeyjyAwanMyCvg
Has anybody listened to Mongolian band The HU

Recently, I listened to 'Kids See Ghosts' album, by Kanye West and Kid Cudi. I'm in love with almost every song. 

'Reborn' feels so relaxing. It's like a comfort song when you feel lost. 

I love how godly "I feel free" sounds.

Kanye saying "gat gat gat gat gat..." in the first song is stuck in my head for unreasonably long time.

Link : https://music.youtube.com/playlist?list=OLAK5uy_mo_SIUnjlx4i6w5-P_SHrA9Cib9kkclXA
